events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at the intersection on April 9th.
Claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report of the vehicle collision.
A claims agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim to ensure prompt follow-up and assistance.
Acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim with a confirmation sent to the insured for further documentation.
Request sent for police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation of the accident.
Insured submitted all requested documents including police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair quotes.
The investigation into the cause and liability of the auto accident has officially commenced by the claims team.
Investigation completed with findings indicating the insured was not at fault for the collision.
Settlement offer proposed to the insured covering all damages and vehicle repair costs after investigation results.
The insured responded with appreciation for the claims process and agreed to the proposed settlement offer.
The claim has been formally approved following agreement on the settlement, authorising payment to the insured.
Payment issued to the insuredâ€™s account for repair costs as per the settlement agreement of this auto accident claim.
The auto accident claim is now closed, with all payments made and no further action required from the insured.
All documents and correspondence have been archived for this auto accident claim in compliance with company policy.
